MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Chemistry | b: Biology | c: Physics | d: Geology

MCQ: Which theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Energy processing | c: Cell structure | d: Regulation of internal environments

MCQ: What allows organisms to move, grow, and reproduce?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Energy processing | c: Cell structure | d: Regulation of internal environments

MCQ: How long ago did life on Earth emerge?
Choices: a: 3.7 million years ago | b: 3.7 thousand years ago | c: 3.7 billion years ago | d: 3.7 trillion years ago

MCQ: What is the main unit of organization that biologists study?
Choices: a: Planets | b: Cells | c: Rocks | d: Stars
